timeout_reason_no_opponent: No opponent joined before the timer expired.

timeout_refund_missing_single_challenger: The creator claimed the timeout and receives 98% of the total stake (2% fee).

group_feed_usage:
Use `/banmaofeed <minimum_stake>` to broadcast games with stakes equal or above that amount (in $BANMAO). Example: `/banmaofeed 50`.
Send `/banmaofeed off` to disable.

help_command_start: â€¢ `/start` â€” Reopen the welcome message and link from the DApp when you press *Open bot*.
help_command_register: â€¢ `/register <wallet_address>` â€” Manually add a wallet to your watch list.
help_command_mywallet: â€¢ `/mywallet` â€” View every wallet you are currently monitoring.
help_command_stats: â€¢ `/stats` â€” See your game results and profit statistics.
help_command_banmaoprice: â€¢ ğŸ’± `/banmaoprice` â€” Fetch the latest $BANMAOâ†’USDT quote from OKX DEX.
help_command_okxchains: â€¢ `/okxchains` â€” List the OKX DEX chains supported by the bot.
help_command_okx402status: â€¢ `/okx402status` â€” Check the availability of OKX x402 settlement.
help_command_unregister: â€¢ `/unregister` â€” Remove selected wallets (or all) from monitoring.
help_command_language: â€¢ `/language` â€” Change the bot interface language.
help_command_banmaofeed: â€¢ `/banmaofeed <amount|off>` â€” Configure automatic broadcasts in group chats (group only).
help_command_feedlang: â€¢ `/feedlang` â€” Choose your personal language for group feed alerts (group only). Use `/feedlang off` to reset.
help_command_feedtopic: â€¢ `/feedtopic` â€” Choose which topic receives group feed updates (group only).
help_command_help: â€¢ `/help` â€” Show this list of commands again.
help_command_checkin: â€¢ `/checkin` â€” Request today's verification challenge via DM (group only; also available through the "Check-in" button).
help_command_topcheckin: â€¢ `/topcheckin [streak|total|points|longest]` â€” Show the leaderboard based on the selected metric (group only).
help_command_checkin_admin: â€¢ Check-in management â€” Use `/checkinadmin` in the group or tap the "âš™ï¸ Manage check-in" button on the daily prompt to broadcast reminders, review attendance, unlock members, adjust points, configure summary windows, send secret notes, or reset math questions.

Send this note to your members:
â€¢ Press the group's "Check in" button or use /checkin to start today's challenge.
â€¢ Have your Xlayer wallet ready so your attendance earns the configured points.
â€¢ Answer the math check to prove you're human!
